jcr:content.jcr:description: Introducing the all-new Timp 4, with upgraded cushioning, an improved fit, and an aggressive outsole. Ready for any trail, any dirt, any terrain.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Timp 4

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML:
THE ALL-NEW

Timp 4

Any trail. Any dirt. Any Terrain.

video.description: Altra Running - Timp 4 Trail Shoe Launch Video
video.name: Timp 4 Launch Video

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML: We took a step off the beaten path and made one of our favorite trail runners even better. With upgraded cushioning, an improved fit, and an aggressive outsole, the all-new Timp 4 never met a trail it didn’t like.

image.alt: Shot of rear portion of Altra Lone Peak 6, showing the Ego midsole.

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
UNBRIDLED COMFORT

Discover more trail with an all-new Altra EGO™ MAX midsole. Designed to give you maximum comfort and performance that's ready to take you through the toughest terrain.

customhtml2_copy.customHTML:
TRAILBLAZING
FIT
Experience improved fit and performance that’s ready to tackle any adventure. We gave the Timp 4 an all-new mesh construction and a more secure fit in the heel and midfoot that will take you around, over, and through any obstacle.

image.alt: Shot of rear portion of Altra Lone Peak 6, showing the Ego midsole.

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
MAX GRIP. MAXTRAC™

Feel a stronger connectionto the dirt with an upgraded MaxTrac™ outsole. All-new aggressive, multi-directional lug patterns are designed to give you a tighter grip to crush the climbs, master the downs, and rule the flats.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
PERFORMANCE AND COMFORT ON ANY TERRAIN

The Timp 4 features our Standard FootShape™ Fit, our most common fit found in Altra Running® shoes. This feature allows your toes to relax and sit naturally to give you the power and stability you need for better running performance on the trail.

ctabutton.buttontext: LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR FOOTSHAPE™ FITS

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML: DISCOVER ONE OF OUR MOST CAPABLE TRAIL SHOES EVER.
